channel.title: Creating a new Rank, like Donator
channel.description:
How would i be able to create a new rank like donator? Only make it custom crown type nothign else?
I have a client+Server ..

item.title: Creating a new Rank, like Donator
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

First, create an integer or boolean that will change to determine if they are donator or not. You will need to also edit your saving methods to save that boolean/integer.

I believe there is a tutorial in the client hacking sections that will teach you custom crowns.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a new Rank, like Donator
